snippet: Google reached a tentative settlement with European antitrust authorities on Wednesday, ending a lengthy competition investigation into the American tech company’s practices that could have led to billions of dollars in penalties.
abstract: Google reached a tentative settlement with European antitrust authorities on Wednesday, ending a lengthy competition investigation into the American tech company’s practices that could have led to billions of dollars in penalties.

headline.main: Daily Report: Google Reaches Tentative Deal in European Antitrust Case
